titleStmt.title: The humble vindication of the Commissioners of the General Assembly and their late proceedings in answer to the letter of the high and honourable court of Parliament, dated May 11 to the several Presbyteries in the Kingdom
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Edinb. 6. Iunii, 1648.

Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
